name: Firefly (Shukelven)
description:
You are a little cube lost in an unknown dark world. All you can see around you are falling souls and the light of a little firefly that guides you through the darkness to avoid getting trapped in this forsaken world.

Use your mouse cursor to control the firefly and see ahead so you can avoid dark platforms that will kill you. Move with the WASD keys.

-

No sprites since I'm not very good at art (at least not yet), just the default ones Unity has.

Thanks for playing!
